mdRecord.dcterms:title: Whispers of heavenly death / by Walt Whitman
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Whitman, Walt, 1819-1892
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Originally published in "Broadway (London) Oct., 1868. Collected in Passage to India, 1871, wunder 5 different titles: Whispers of heavenly death -- Darest thou now, O Soul -- A noiseless, patient spider -- The last invocation -- Pensive and faltering. -- Cf. BAL

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Fragile; damaged at old fold lines. Accompanied by original mailing envelope addressed in Whitman's hand, to "Mrs. Eames, with best respects Walt Whitman." Also accompanied by a typed statement authenticating provenance on letterhead of The Attic Book Shop, a clipped dealer's description and a sheet of handwritten notes about the broadside. Clifton Waller Barrett Library, Walt Whitman Collection. Gift of C.W. Barrett.
